metadata.title: CVE-2021-40812 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description:
The GD Graphics Library (aka LibGD) through 2.3.2 has an out-of-bounds readbecause of the lack of certain gdGetBuf and gdPutBuf return value checks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-40812` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.3.3-9ubuntu5
libgd3 - 2.3.3-9ubuntu5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.3-9ubuntu5').
